subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Arnaud Clément and Michael Llodra defeated Nenad Zimonjic and Viktor Troicki, 3-6, 6-7 (3), 6-4, 7-5, 6-4, to give France a 2-1 lead against host Serbia in their Davis Cup final in Belgrade.
snippet: Arnaud Clément and Michael Llodra defeated Nenad Zimonjic and Viktor Troicki, 3-6, 6-7 (3), 6-4, 7-5, 6-4, to give France a 2-1 lead against host Serbia in their Davis Cup final in Belgrade.
